overview: Kayvan Baroumand is the Founder and CEO of NestGSV. NestGSV is the worlds first “Ecobator”. An ecobator is a platform that supports innovation economy with emerging technolgy companies, large technology companies, Universities and governments. Prior to NestGSV Kayvan was the President of AlwaysOn, a national media company who’s mission is to identify the top 100 private in the sectors that technology is thriving. Prior to AlwaysOn, Kayvan was the founding COO of Plug and Play Tech Center, which is one the largest and successful technology Centers in the world.
